metadata.dc:title: Diagnostic aproach of acute osteomyelitis in infants. Imaging modalities
metadata.dc:description: Osteomyelitis in children represents a diagnosticand therapeutic challenge to the pediatrician, the radiologist,the surgeon and the pathologist. Earlydiagnosis allows prompt treatment which can preventthe devasting complications and permanent sequelaeoutcome. In the present article we review themodern imaging techniques for the diagnosis of osteomyelitisinsisting on the importance of conventionalradiology for its availability for pediatricians
